api_list.name: Create an invoice_copy
api_list.description: Returns a PDF invoice based on the specified parameters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://invoice-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/generate_invoice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "invoice-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
